# Streamlit

DATA APPS

Streamlit is an open-source app framework designed for creating and sharing data apps. It allows users to build and deploy interactive web applications in Python effortlessly. With a minimal amount of code, data scientists and analysts can turn their data scripts into rich, functional apps that can be shared and iterated on quickly.

## Streamlit + MotherDuck

Streamlit can be integrated with MotherDuck to create interactive data applications that leverage the power of DuckDB in the cloud. By connecting Streamlit apps to MotherDuck, users can query, analyze, and visualize data stored in MotherDuck's cloud data warehouse, enabling seamless and efficient data workflows directly within Streamlit's user-friendly interface.
